p: Sofosbuvir, a nucleotide analog that brought revolutionary changes in the treatment of the hepatitis C virus, has been found to decrease genotype 3 HEV replication in vitro [ 56]. Valk et al. reported a case of chronic hepatitis E in an immunocompromised patient where sofosbuvir showed antiviral activity [ 57â€¢]. Wezel et al. observed that sofosbuvir showed antiviral activity in chronic HEV-infected three solid organ transplant patients but failed to achieve sustained virological response [ 58].
